testcase.classname: Sign up with Email for All Country and Consumer Device Android
testcase.name: Sign up with Email with South Africa
testcase.system-out: Given Open the curaprox consumer application and Select the country as South Africa.passed And Tab Next button.........................................................passed And Click on sign up with email.............................................passed Then Type email and password................................................passed And Click on sign up button.................................................passed And Click on accept terms and conditions....................................passed Then Open Gmail and conform the link........................................passed And Curaprox app open.......................................................passed And Type first name and last name and click next button.....................passed And Click on No, I have not been referred by anyone.........................passed And Click on next button till profile page open.............................passed And Click on my account right side corner in the application................passed And Click on logout.........................................................passed

testcase.classname: Sign up with Email for All Country and Consumer Device Android
testcase.name: Sign up with facebook
testcase.system-out: Given Open the curaprox consumer application and Select the country as South Africa.passed And Tab Next button.........................................................passed And Click on sign up with facebook..........................................passed And Open facebook application...............................................passed Then Type facebook email and password.......................................passed Then Close the application..................................................passed
